pageContext._xxxcollectionDescriptionxtxt: Papers trace Fernandez's career from her early days in radio to her work in television and movie productions, through to her retirement in 1982 and subsequent activities. The collection consists of scrapbooks, photographs, honors and awards, the bulk of which are in the form of plaques.
